name: Battlefield (Markt & Technik)
overview: Published in 64'er Sonderheft 37. A pretty good futuristic tank simulator/shooter with a touch of Tron thrown in for fun. Game objective: save humanity from aliens and destroy their base. End of game: After the supply of the alien base is interrupted by a tanker fleet the aliens capitulate. Special features: Contact with your own protective shield saves the human refugees. Weapons are laser (fire button) and energy bombs triggered with the CBM key. After this The aliens are shown in a demonstration at the start. The small mark on the edge of the screen the direction in which the alien base is located.
